name: Wake (itch) (Ochopika)
description:
Wake is a 3D platformer where your choices make a difference in your gameplay experience.  

(Music is a bit loud, turn down headphone volume before starting)

Explore your childhood dreams as you doze off to an old storybook. Discover a complicated relationship from the past and make amends...or choose to walk away. You have the power to choose what you remember and what you let go.

Credits:

Collin Anderson - Programming/Game Design/Level Design

Audrey Meyer - Environment Art/VFX/Lighting/Character Model

Soren O'Shiro - Character Rigging/Environment Art

Ross Sauby - Story/Illustrations

Wesley Meyer - Music Composition
